translations: 可转换的，可兑换的；（汽车）有活动折蓬的；（词语）同义的
活动顶篷式汽车；可换证券

phrs.translation: 可换公司债；可转换证券
自由兑换货币；可兑换货币；可兑换通货
可转换证券；可兑换证券

sentences.sentence: In order to keep the currency convertible, they had to keep interest rates high to prevent people from demanding to exchange the gold.
sentences.translation: 为了保持货币的转换性，他们不得不将利率提高，以防人们向他们索求金子的兑换。

sentences.sentence: Switzerland has already chosen one version of this approach by forcing its two big banks to issue new contingent convertible (CoCo) bonds.
sentences.translation: 瑞士已经采取了类似的做法，规定其两家大银行发行新的或有可转换（CoCo）债券。

sentences.sentence: Her own car is a convertible VW.
sentences.translation: 她的车是一辆大众敞篷汽车。
